Concept.Comments: Message to user when the exam is opened in another workstation
Message to user when the exam opened is a readonly one (i.e. on not-writable media)
Concept.String: Exam opened in readonly: any modification will be discarded

Concept.Comments: Message to the user when press the delete button inside measure
Concept.String: Confirm measure deletion? Operation cannot be undone

Concept.Comments: Message to the user when enter empty wks
Message to the user when the xml file restored has errors
